Sentencas: Chromium based ODS alloys are being discussed as interconnector materials in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC's).
Titulo: Carburization of Cr-based ODS alloys in SOFC relevant environments

Sentencas: One of the major requirements for the interconnect material is sufficient corrosion resistance in the anode and cathode side gases at the operating temperature of around 950 degrees C.
Titulo: Carburization of Cr-based ODS alloys in SOFC relevant environments

Sentencas: In the present study the corrosion behaviour of a number of chromium based ODS alloys has been investigated in carbon containing simulated anode gas of an SOFC.
Titulo: Carburization of Cr-based ODS alloys in SOFC relevant environments

Sentencas: Under these experimental conditions all alloys studied are prone to carburization.
Titulo: Carburization of Cr-based ODS alloys in SOFC relevant environments

Sentencas: The carbon uptake, which mainly occurs in the early stages of exposure, leads to the formation of a mixed carbide/oxide laver beneath the external chromia scale.
Titulo: Carburization of Cr-based ODS alloys in SOFC relevant environments

Sentencas: The carburization resistance of the alloys depends on the type and concentration of the oxide dispersion but even to a larger extent on its distribution.
Titulo: Carburization of Cr-based ODS alloys in SOFC relevant environments

Sentencas: Therefore the cartful control of the alloy manufacturing process is of great significance for obtaining sufficient carburization resistance under SOFC conditions.
Titulo: Carburization of Cr-based ODS alloys in SOFC relevant environments
